trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects, which is used when the connections are declared in content pages and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control is declared in a master page.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> class is used in a specific development scenario.

If a Web Parts application uses master pages, with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control declared in a master page, and individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects declared in content pages as static connections, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> class is used.

In the content pages, multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> controls can be declared, which differs from the ordinary rule that only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can be declared on a page.

Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control on a content page can contain a `<StaticConnections>` element, and this element can contain one or more declared `<asp:webpartconnection>` elements.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> class is used by the Web Parts control set to create a collection of all the static connections declared in each content page, and these collections are ultimately added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> collection in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> class is used to create the collection of static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object to the collection.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.Add%2A> method to add new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects to an existing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to add to the collection.
An integer value that indicates where the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> was inserted into the collection.
Returns a value indicating whether a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object exists in the collection.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object and determine whether it is in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> being checked for its existence in a collection.
`true` if value exists in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.CopyTo%2A> method is useful when you want to create a custom array to programmatically manipulate a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects.
An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
An integer that indicates the starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.IndexOf%2A> method is useful when you want to know the ordinal position (index) of one object relative to the others in a collection.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object into the collection at the specified index.
If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, then `value` is appended to the end of the collection.
An integer indicating the ordinal position in the collection at which a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> should be inserted.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to insert into the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects can be added to the collection.
`true` if connection objects cannot be added to the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a connection item within the collection, based on an index number indicating the item's location in the collection.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.Item%2A> property enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection by using an index number that represents the item's ordinal position in the collection.
An integer that indicates the index of a member of the collection.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
Returns a specific member of the collection according to a unique identifier.
This property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object with the specified ID by performing a case-insensitive comparison.
A string that contains the ID of a particular connection in the collection.
The first whose ID matches the value of the id parameter.
Returns `null` if no match is found.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object from the collection.
Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object from the collection.
All items that follow the specified item are then moved up in the collection to fill in the vacant position.
The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to be removed.
